titles.title: A concurrent resolution requesting that the next President of the United States continue the practice of holding annual summit meetings with the leader of the Soviet Union.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 6/3/1988--Introduced. Calls upon the next President of the United States to continue the practice of holding annual summit meetings with the leader of the Soviet Union.
